verses.roman:
tato bahuratho nāma
purumīḍho 'prajo 'bhavat
nalinyām ajamīḍhasya
nīlaḥ śāntis tu tat-sutaḥ

synonyms: tataḥ—from him (Ripuñjaya); bahurathaḥ—Bahuratha; nāma—named; purumīḍhaḥ—Purumīḍha, the younger brother of Dvimīḍha; aprajaḥ—sonless; abhavat—became; nalinyām—through Nalinī; ajamīḍhasya—of Ajamīḍha; nīlaḥ—Nīla; śāntiḥ—Śānti; tu—then; tat-sutaḥ—the son of Nīla.
translation: From Ripuñjaya came a son named Bahuratha. Purumīḍha was sonless. Ajamīḍha had a son named Nīla by his wife known as Nalinī, and the son of Nīla was Śānti.
